title: The Rekindled Affair
description: Robert Jones suddenly reappeared into her life. This was her second chance. He was the one that had got away and he made her feel like a giddy teenager again. Something about him stirred her up inside. A lot had changed in the 45 years they had been apart but at least one thing had stayed the same; he still knew how to press all her buttons. This was the night Victoria Noakes would truly live up to her reputation. The harlot in surgical stockings has a hot date.Warning: Explicit Innuendo and Scenes of a Sexual Nature.
author: Peter   John
